title: Is physics 12th board exam tough? - Quora

response.answer_text: I m also writing the exam today (And look I m here wasting time at quora)… anyways…it all depends on your preparation and presence of mind while writing the exam….i tell u I m a good student and had worked my ass off whole year but i could not or idk…..Maybe i did not study physics at my full potential and had just passed with 28 in my physics Preboards and even in the vacation after that i only studied chemi and bio as they were easy to me and whenever i touched physics it was as if it we as infused with chloroform, i would fall asleep…so today I can't do anything than go there in full confidence, write whatever i can and maybe hope to get more than 50 anyhow and trust me i did not prepare well……you can't do much now so relax…in my case in the morning at 4 i woke up thinking i would study but with all that stress of poor physics all i was able to do was feel sick in the gut so I instead started thinking about my upcoming birthday in may till i felt good and then studied a bit…i m wasting my and yours time….i m sorry…..But answer to your question is : however is the paper, you can't do anything about it now so relax do whatever you can think of there and hope for the best….wish me luck….i wish you luck….WE WILL ROCK IT…..Woohoo!!!

Namaste, Not at all. Physics 12th Board exam was never tough for those who prepared well. An easy subject becomes tough to those who fail to prepare. Prepare well, make time table, be punctual to the time table and work hard, I am sure you will get good marks. Always remember, ‘If you fail to prepare, be prepared to fail.” All the Best! Jai Hind.
